about_the_game:
※This content requires the base game (sold separately) in order to play. Please also ensure that your base game software is updated to the most recent patch.

Description:
A set of three accessories that increase EXP, SP, and GOLD respectively. These accessories can be equipped by all units.
detailed_description:
※This content requires the base game (sold separately) in order to play. Please also ensure that your base game software is updated to the most recent patch.

Description:
A set of three accessories that increase EXP, SP, and GOLD respectively. These accessories can be equipped by all units.
name: Booster Accessory Set

subs.option_text: 剣と魔法と学園クエスト。 - ブーストアクセサリセット - $1.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4670 CPU @ 3.40GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4770 CPU @ 3.40GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Description: A set of three accessories that increase EXP, SP, and GOLD respectively. These accessories can be equipped by all units.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, English
*languages with full audio support
